strings.feedbackText: Found a bug? Have a question?

markup.description: The Uploader allows users to upload multiple files. The user can select desired files from their computer, view them in a queue, add or remove files to and from the queue, and upload them.
markup.instructions:
• Click the 'Browse Files' buttonto select files to be added to the queue.
  • Use the red 'X' delete button to remove files from the queue.
  • Click the 'Add More' button to add more files to the queue.
  • Click 'Upload' to start the upload.
  • Click 'Stop Upload' to pause the upload.
